cellTooltip.correctVyanjan: {} is the correct letter at this position, but its variant is incorrect.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjan: {} is present in the correct answer but in a different variant, and at a different position.
cellTooltip.emptyWithMatra: This cell contains {} matra with a full letter and no half letter.
cellTooltip.emptyWithAdha: This cell contains half {} along with some full letter, but no matra.
cellTooltip.emptyWithMatraAndAdha: This cell contains half {} and {} matra along with some full letter.
cellTooltip.emptyWithoutMatraAndAdha: This cell only contains a full letter with no additional matra or half letter.
